title: How to write a research paper in one night - Quora

response.answer_text: Know what you’re going to be writing about very well, have a reasonable idea of what you’d like to say about it, and mix well with equal parts inspiration and caffeine. Having literate friends who won’t mind proofreading on short notice also helps. But if you haven’t taken care of the first two before you sit down at the keyboard, the rest won’t save you. Short version: it can be done if you know your subject well, but putting it off until the last minute means that it’s not going to be very good.

You can’t - at least not honestly or with any quality. In order to write a good research paper, you need to spend enough time researching your topic to become a mini-expert. Otherwise you can’t write intelligently. Hopefully you don’t have a paper due tomorrow.
